description:
Blood Hustle is a brand new online browser based RPG packed with awesome features and a great community! There’s a great staff team always ready to help!

This app has an optimized display for mobile devices.

You’ll have a chance at making it to the top and becoming the top Hustler!

In Blood Hustle there are a load of exciting things to help you make your way to the top and you can choose your own path!

Here are some of the great features you can find in Blood Hustle:

•	Become a Gang Leader or join an existing one and wage wars against your rivals
•	Wide range of Crimes to do which will help you make some money and progress in the game
•	Casino with some great games like Blackjack, Video Poker, Roulette, Slots and a Multiplayer Texas Hold’em
•	Racing Scene, where you can buy a car, tune it up and compete in individual challenges and in Tournaments
•	Chat and Shoutbox to chat away with the rest of the community
•	A wide range of Multiplayer Games where you can challenge your friends for cash of just plain old fun
•	Horse and Dog Races in which you can take part after buying a pet! Train it and turn your pet into a winner
•	Full blown Property Market where you can own several properties and rent them out for some extra income
•	Create your own Company and run it how you see fit, hopefully making some money out of it
•	Stock Market where you can trade stocks and make a killing
•	Arcade Games with trophies for highest scores
•	And so much more!!! There is just too much to list!

Blood Hustle will most definitely provide you some quality entertainment and moments of great fun!

So, what are you waiting for? Sign up and start enjoying this great game!

And remember you can also play Blood Hustle on your computer by going to http://bloodhustle.com
